alert.note: Alert for Coahoma; Quitman (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 8:27PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Coahoma and northwestern Quitman Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 826 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kings, or 8 miles north of Clarksdale, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarksdale, Jonestown, Friars Point, Belen, Kings, Coahoma, Lyon, Lula, Rudyard, Moon, Clover Hill, Delta, Roseacres, Matagorda, Rich and Barksdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
